title: We found a valley
brief_description: An account of the building of a large oil refinery on a strip of sand near Aden in Arabia. Shows the difficulties and local hazards encountered in this engineering achievement.
description: An account of the building of a large oil refinery on a strip of sand near Aden in Arabia. Shows the difficulties and local hazards encountered in this engineering achievement.
